  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(int x, int y)
      Constructs the player to be the size of 30*30 as one pixel.
      Parameters:
      x - an integer value that indicates the x coordinate of the top-left corner of the player
      y - an integer value that indicates the y coordinate of the top-left corner of the player
      See Also:
      Rectangle

  • Method Details

    • scoreChange

      public void scoreChange​(int scoreChange)
      Sets the change to the player's current score. This method will be called each time the player eats the reward/bonus reward or touches an stationary enemy/punishment.
      Parameters:
      scoreChange -

    • roundChange

      public void roundChange()

    • scoreDown

      public void scoreDown​(int valPunish)

    • getPlayerScore

      public int getPlayerScore()
      Retrieves the player's current score.
      Returns:
      an integer that indicates the player's current score

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Controls and realizes the player's movement based on the current time intervals. At each time interval, this method will be called in Game class for processing the input from the keyboard.
      See Also:
      Tick, Clock

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Render the cell of the player to be the picture at the resource folder. This method will set the color scheme for the argument to be drawn, and then fill it with the size according to the constructor of Player class.
      Parameters:
      g - a default Graphics object
      See Also:
      Graphics, Image
